title: 呜呜呜求教啊，我创建了个组，加入的成员都没有权限交互，别说没继承builder，没有用
author: 希望C
txt_content: 根本不行啊，继承builder也没用啊，求高人指点{:10_504:}{:10_502:}

replies.author: TenGen_C
replies.txt_content: 配置文件改，指令不一定行

replies.author: robbit
replies.txt_content:
groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.protect.pvp
    - at.use
    - automessage.receive.builder
    - frameprotect.use
    - kit.tools
    - paintball.general
    - plotme.use
    - plotme.use.add
    - plotme.use.remove
    - quickshop.create
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - scoreboardstats.use
    - serversigns.use
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&a[公民]&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

这是建筑权限，你需要把false改成true然后输入/manload重载权限组插件就好了

我的权限组= =

记得采纳

replies.txt_content:
